import { useState } from "react"; import { loadSlips } from "./Connect"; export const ViewSlips=()=> { const[allslips,setAllslips]=useState([]) const Loadingmyrecords=async()=> { const t=await loadSlips(); } return( <>
New Payslip
{allslips.map((v)=>( ))}
Payslip id Payslip date BasicPay Allowance TDS Take Home
{v.payslipId} {v.payslipDate} {v.payslipBasicsalary} {v.payslipAllowance} {v.payslipTds} {v.payslipTakehome}
); }
